meanings.definition: Resembling a rug in appearance or texture.
meanings.sent1: The soft, ruglike fabric felt cozy against my skin.
meanings.sent2: The carpet was so ruglike that it almost blended in with the actual rug.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally mistook the ruglike blanket for an actual rug and tried to walk on it.
meanings.sent4: The clouds in the sky looked ruglike, as if a giant had spread a massive carpet above us.
meanings.sent5: The ruglike pattern on the pillow made it look like a miniature piece of flooring.
